placeholders.tip: **Tip:** Use Developer Tools → States to find your sensor entity IDs.
placeholders.sensors_help:
**Sensor Requirements:**
• Temperature sensors should have device_class='temperature'
• Pressure sensors should use relative pressure (barometric)
• Wind sensors should be in km/h or mph
• Solar radiation in W/m², lux in lx
placeholders.current_sensors: **Current Setup:** You can update any sensor assignments or adjust the update frequency.
placeholders.update_help: **Update Behavior:** Changes take effect immediately. The weather entity will update according to the new interval.
